page.title: 05SURVEY : LIMEKILN ROAD
page.content: Along{Freeholdland,}running North to south (parallel to the{Afon Lwyd)}is a major road. It runs from{Abersychan to {Pontnewynydd}and is called{Limekiln {Road.}The road is mostly residential. There are{6 detatched houses,26 semi {-detatched houses, 3 houses have a {garage and 6 more have garage spaces. When the houses were built there were few cars on the road. There is a{Chap- {el of Rest, a small motor repairers, a {servicing firm and a builder's yard. There is{an old people's complex called{Pleasant Court.}They have{8 {bungalows, 2 for disabled people. There are also{flats and bedsitters. They are looked after by a warden who lives there. Next to the complex is the{Fire Station. Hidden by trees is the{old lime quar {-ry and kiln}which gives the road its name:{LIMEKILN ROAD.
